body: @Loli_Lives_Matter: Are you sure? I thought it emphasized that something bad happened to her sister like she died or something since that was the purpose of him getting a sunflower in the first place.
I like the emphasize the author put on the flower petals at the end by boxing them on their own to symbolize the complete and utter defloweration of that defenseless shota...
niggas be stealin sunflowers at this time of day respect 😤😤😤
